title: Football Player Profile Schema
description: Defines how to extract Football Manager-style player data from screenshots or text for AI analysis.

player.description: Biographical, contract, and personality details of the player.

id.description: Unique player identifier, usually based on name and birth year.

age.description: Age of the player in years.

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format.

nationality.description: Country or nationality of the player.

preferred_foot.description: Player's dominant foot: Right, Left, or Both.

media_description.description: Short role description (e.g., Forward, Defender, etc.).

reputation.description: Level of reputation (e.g., Local, National, Continental, Worldwide).

min.description: Minimum estimated market value in USD.

max.description: Maximum estimated market value in USD.

club.description: Name of the club the player is contracted to.

expiry_date.description: Contract end date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

overall_condition.description: General physical condition, e.g., Good or Poor.

match_sharpness.description: Level of match readiness (High, Medium, Low).

dynamics.description: Social and influence aspects within the team.

influence.description: Influence level within squad (e.g., Influential Player, Team Leader).

positives.description: Number of positive relationships or morale indicators.

negatives.description: Number of negative relationships or morale indicators.

short_term.description: Immediate short-term plans (e.g., transfer, training goals).

attributes.description: Player performance attributes expressed as percentage (0–100).

total_overall.description: Overall player strength combining all attributes.

player_traits.description: Special habits or play styles (e.g., 'Likes to beat offside trap').

goalkeeper_rating.description: Overall goalkeeper skill rating (0–20 scale, optional for non-GKs).

stats.description: Seasonal match statistics (apps, goals, assists, etc.).

profile_summary.description: AI-generated summary of player’s performance and tactical fit.

ideal_tactical_fit.description: Summary of suitable tactical role or formation fit.
